content.raw:
I’ve got a couple of cloudsim runs which have been going for 2.5 and 4 hours now.  Edit: I never saw a cloudsim show as complete in less than 6 hours, despite the simulation portion only taking about 1.25hours \(~4000 seconds\)

9491b249-f0c4-4825-a56c-b5c08e5a432a  
8c55f9cd-dda7-443c-b606-3d077b22efaf

Is there any way these runs could end at the 1 hour since competition start mark to see results faster? Will they end if I call the competition ending service?

‌

‌

I’ve got a couple of cloudsim runs which have been going for 2.5 and 4 hours now. Edit: I never saw a cloudsim show as complete in less than 6 hours, despite the simulation portion only taking about 1.25hours (~4000 seconds)
